# **Part 1: Stock selection**

```{r definition data-question1}
library(quantmod)

# Set start date and end date of data
start_date <- "2014-01-02"
end_date <- "2018-12-31"

# Get data for JPM, FB and the 10 year T-bill (TNX)
getSymbols("WKHS", src = "yahoo", from = start_date, to = end_date)
getSymbols("GWPH", src = "yahoo", , from = start_date, to = end_date)
getSymbols("COOP", src = "yahoo", , from = start_date, to = end_date)
getSymbols("CAT", src = "yahoo", , from = start_date, to = end_date)
getSymbols("DE", src = "yahoo", , from = start_date, to = end_date)
getSymbols("^GSPC", src = "yahoo", , from = start_date, to = end_date) # S&P 500
getSymbols("^TNX", src = "yahoo", from = start_date, to = end_date) # TNX (10-year T-bill)

# Get adjusted returns dATA
rWKHS <- diff(log(to.monthly(WKHS)$WKHS.Adjusted))
rGWPH <- diff(log(to.monthly(GWPH)$GWPH.Adjusted))
rCOOP <- diff(log(to.monthly(COOP)$COOP.Adjusted))
rCAT <- diff(log(to.monthly(CAT)$CAT.Adjusted))
rDE <- diff(log(to.monthly(DE)$DE.Adjusted))
rGSPC <- diff(log(to.monthly(GSPC)$GSPC.Adjusted))
rTNX <- (to.monthly(TNX)$TNX.Adjusted) / 1200 # Using monthly rate

# Calculate statistics
mean_rWKHS <- mean(rWKHS, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_rGWPH <- mean(rGWPH, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_rCOOP <- mean(rCOOP, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_rCAT <- mean(rCAT, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_rDE <- mean(rDE, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_rGSPC <- mean(rGSPC, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_rTNX <- mean(rTNX, na.rm = TRUE)

sd_rWKHS <- sd(rWKHS, na.rm = TRUE)
sd_rGWPH <- sd(rGWPH, na.rm = TRUE)
sd_rCOOP <- sd(rCOOP, na.rm = TRUE)
sd_rCAT <- sd(rCAT, na.rm = TRUE)
sd_rDE <- sd(rDE, na.rm = TRUE)
sd_rGSPC <- sd(rGSPC, na.rm = TRUE)


```
